title: Note: 1
clause_text: Note: 1. The Commissioner may add to the list of buildings mentioned above on which installation of SWH systems can be made mandatory.
section: Special Provisions; for installation of Solar Water Heating (SWH) Systems.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Note: 1. The Commissioner may add to the list of buildings mentioned above on which installation of SWH systems can be made mandatory.
